Read and aggregate heatmap records

Source: R/utils.R
read_heatmap_records.Rd

Scale coordinates to make sure they render the same on all screens.

Usage

read_heatmap_records(records, viewport_dims)

Arguments

records

Returned by get_heatmap_records.

viewport_dims

Obtained from JS and stored in session$input$viewport_dims.

Value

A list with aggregated data.
